attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reduce the tax on cigarretes for the reason that the public are buying illegal drugs soley because they are cheaper and easier to obtain than cigarretes. The policy of high tax on tobacco means an increasing number of people are turning to drugs, the tax is creating future problems for the safety of the public at large, the increase in drug users can already be seen. Reduce the tax NOW.
